info.name: Mangafox - Clean version
info.description:
mangafox.la
This style will cleanup the reader and the homepage

Tags: manga
info.additionalInfo:
### Updates And Bug fixes: ###
2018-01-29: Added fanfox.net to the domain list.
2017-12-06: Changed address to match current domain mangafox.la
2017-10-04: Updated style for https
2015-06-12: More ads are blocked
2014-08-30: The forum threads container is back on the manga pages
2014-07-24: New ads had popped up so i took care of them
2014-07-13: Removed the annoying warning for mature content
2013-01-08: Top center looks okay again
2012-07-22: Removed the two new ad DOM elements on both sides of the reader.
2012-04-09: Fixed so the chapter links is shown once again



### Feature: ###
Home:
*Removed footer
*Removed spotlight
*Removed facebook frame


Reader:
*Fixed top bar
*Removed bottom bar
*Removed ads
*Removed footer
